title: HEO looks to expand satellite imaging beyond low Earth orbit
summary:

title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 3rd consecutive Falcon 9 rocket from Vandenberg SFB, uninterrupted by a Cape mission
summary: The Starlink 11-39 mission is scheduled to liftoff from pad 4E at Vandenberg Space Force Base at 6:21 a.m. PDT (9:21 a.m. EDT / 1321 UTC). The Falcon 9 rocket will fly on a south-easterly trajectory.

title: DLR Prepares to Launch Small Reusable Space Transportation Demonstrator
summary:
The German Aerospace Center (DLR) is preparing to launch its ATHEAt reusable space transportation demonstrator mission from Andøya Space in Norway. Initiated in January 2022, the Advanced Technologies for High Energetic Atmospheric Flight of Launcher Stages (ATHEAt) demonstrator programme is focused on testing key technologies for future reusable space vehicles, with a particular emphasis on […]

title: Space security, threats and rapid innovation
summary:

title: Fly over Xanthe Terra with Mars Express
summary: ESA’s Mars Express takes us on another mesmerising flight over curving channels carved by water, islands that have resisted erosion, and a maze of hilly terrain.

title: China’s ‘near space’ legal warfare
summary:
In February 2023, a United States Air Force fighter jet shot down a Chinese high-altitude balloon flying at about 60,000-65,000 feet (18-20 km) altitude in sovereign U.S. airspace.
